title: China launches new Yunhai remote sensing satellite
summary: China added to its series of Yunhai remote sensing satellites late Saturday with a launch from the Gobi Desert.

title: NASA considering budget cuts for Hubble and Chandra space telescopes
summary: NASA is considering cutting the budget of two of its biggest space telescopes as it faces broader spending reductions for its astrophysics programs.
